markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Living Leaf Weave](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1978)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Plant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=125" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 64 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 160 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This suit of [leaf weave](/Armor.aspx?ID=28) armor is specially modified to metabolize the alchemical accelerants in medicinal compounds. A special receptacle in the armor can hold an [elixir of life](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3308), which takes 3 Interact actions to install.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645))   **Requirements** An elixir of life is installed in the armor; **Effect** Slithering vines grow from the armor, granting an item bonus to [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) checks to [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=2376), to your Fortitude DC to resist Grapple, [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=2383), or [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=2380) attempts, and to your Reflex DC to resist Trip attempts. The bonus is equal to the elixir’s item bonus, and lasts for 3 rounds. The activation uses up the elixir, and the armor can’t be activated again until a new one is installed.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Living Leaf Weave
